name: Rose Garden
longDes: You are in the flower gardens of the mansion grounds. The air seems heavy with the fragrance of roses. At a glance, the roses appear to all be red. A small fountain can be seen near the roses. Some birds are wheeling about in the air above the water. To the East is a gazebo standing over the gardens. To the South is the rear entrance of the mansion.
shortDes: You are standing in the rose gardens behind the mansion. The scent of the red roses is almost overpowering. To the East is a white gazebo. To the South is the rear entrance of the house.
